Hippomaps
  • Tutorials

Tutorials

These tutorials reproduce the figures found in HippoMaps (DeKraker et al). They are also meant to serve as examples for common analyses, and to showcase ways of using HippoMaps tools.

Morphology:

  • Overview
  • Histology data
  • Ultra-high field data at 7T
  • High-field data at 3T

Histology-MRI-9p4T:

  • Overview
  • Map and load volumetric data to surfaces
  • Load and plot all surface data
    • Preprocessing
    • Missing data
    • Alignment method
  • Average equivalent samples and view profiles
    • View Laminar profiles
  • Summarize data according to primary gradients
    • save

MRI-7T-struct:

  • Overview
  • Map and load volumetric data to surfaces
  • Load and plot all surface data
  • Stability between subjects
  • Add another dataset (9.4T data)
  • Make a summary plot of consistency
  • Summarize data according to primary gradients
    • save

MRI-3T-rsfMRI:

  • Overview
  • Map rsfMRI data to hippocampal surfaces
  • Intrinsic Timescale of hippocampal rsfMRI
  • Calculate Regional Homogeneity
  • Calculate tSNR
  • Functional connectivity of the hippocampus to neocortex
  • Check consistency for all measures
  • Gradients of differential hippocampal FC
  • save

iEEG:

  • Overview
  • Map data to hippocampal surfaces
  • Load the data and examine attributes
    • Spatial distribution of hippocampal-adjacent channels
    • Compare PSDs from the hippocampus to all channels to ensure they are comparable
    • Compare BPs from the hippocampus to all channels to ensure they are comparable
    • Nicer ridge plot, showing hippocampal data in colour and all data in grey behind
  • Spatial extrapolation
  • Summarize data according to primary gradients
    • save

DimReduct:

  • Overview
  • Load all maps and resample
  • Check for correlations with AP, PD, or subfield organizations
  • Gradient decomposition

MRI-3T-taskfMRI:

  • Overview
  • Map data to hippocampal surface
  • Mnemonic Similarity Task (Pattern Separation)
    • GLM fit
    • Group-averaging and significance/consistency testing
  • significance testing
  • Additional consistency checks
    • Consider neocortical results
    • Compare to previously mapped features
  • Episodic Retrieval
    • GLM fit
    • Group-averaging and significance/consistency testing
    • Consider the neocortex
  • Episodic encoding -subsequent memory
    • GLM fit
    • Group-averaging and significance/consistency testing
    • Consider the neocortex
